name: CodeIsLife
description:
A shooter game about a system virus, trying to destroy the system guards.

Controls: 
WASD to walk
LMB to shoot 0 and RMB to shoot 1.
Note that your ammo = your health. You're a virus shooting code, and you're shooting your code. 

Blue guards are against you. To harm a guard, shoot the combination of 0 and 1 which is above its head. A destroyed guard will drop red spheres — pick them to regain health. When you see a weakened guard flick (its health is  <50%), press F to create an ally to fight beside you. If you die, you will take that ally's place.  You can also heal the ally by shooting at it (you will lose some health/ammo). 

Music and sounds sources: https://sonniss.com/gameaudiogdc https://www.purple-planet.com
